item.title: MindsEye release date set for June 10th
item.content:encoded:
https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/03/28/mindseye-release-date-set-for-june-10th/

Back in February during Sony’s State of Play MindsEye was revealed, with the game being in development by Build A Rocket Boy and published by IOI Partners. Today, more exciting news has surfaced as the release date for MindsEye has been confirmed and you will not have to wait long. On June 10th, MindsEye will be available on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S with pre-orders being available right now.

“We can’t wait for players to immerse themselves in our tightly crafted game, MindsEye, with a
thought-provoking story where technology and ambition collide, and the inevitable consequences
unravel.” said Leslie Benzies, Game Director of MindsEye.

The story of MindsEye takes place in Redrock City, a near future metropolis in which humans and machines battle for power and control, which is shown through the power struggle between Mayor Shiva Vega and tech genius Marco Silva, who is also the founder of the technology firm Silva Industries. Shiva wants to make Redrock City the safest place on the planet, but through controlling the population, while Silva wants to use technology to alter humanity. Caught between all of this is main character Jacob Diaz, who is a on a mission to figure out his past.

MindsEye has been given a price of $59,99 /€59.99/£54,99, and those who pre-order will get a free upgrade to the deluxe edition. This is available for both digital and physical pre-orders. The MindsEye Deluxe Edition includes “Premium Pass”, the Deluxe Thorn & Kepler Yellowjacket Weapon, Future Jacob Vest Skin, “Future” Silva Sedan Vehicle Skin, and the Future DC2 Companion Drone Skin.

Source: Press Release
